column4: I have 2 hd's mounted. one is good one is bad. How can I tell which physical HD is which. One is Quantum, One is Western Digital, IRL
ok I'll disconnect one and reboot. fie.
- You might be able to get some info from the Disk Utility in the Admin menu...
thanks a lot. twas easy. I now know which disk to label TRASH. And thanks all.
